alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Hancock; Henderson; Henry; McDonough; Mercer; Putnam; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:04AM CST until January 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills ranging from 15 below to 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM CST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 AM to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bureau; Hancock; Henderson; Henry; McDonough; Mercer; Putnam; Warren
